nodes.text: Bory was an airless rock planet with no moons that occupied the second closest orbital position to the star Asar. It was located within the Ilum system, a part of the Unknown Regions' 7G sector.
Bory was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the Ilum system, and therefore Bory, in grid square G-7.
